description: Update an existing action item tracker update request.
permissions: User must be authorized to update action item tracker update requests via the delegated action_item_tracker policy (ActionItemTrackerUpdateRequestPolicy).
side_effects: Updates the action item tracker update request; if update_note changes and a related comment exists, an admin-only action item comment is synced asynchronously.
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. At least one of --request-note, --due-on, or --update-note must be provided; otherwise the command errors. --due-on expects an ISO 8601 date (e.g. 2024-12-31).
